DOC.brief_summary: With low carbohydrate dietary approach arm , investigator examine effectiveness 12-weeks intensive lifestyle intervention program provide individual session primary health care obesity clinic Jeddah aim achieve 5 % reduction baseline weight experimental participant comparison active comparator group ( one health education session ) .
DOC.brief_title: 12 Weeks Intensive Lifestyle Intervention Program Primary Care Obesity Clinic Obese Adults : Jeddah 2015
DOC.detailed_description: The study two arm : Active Comparator Arm : Only health education . One session regard diet restriction physical activity print health education paper . Experimental Arm : Intensive lifestyle intervention Weekly individual session obesity clinic ( 15 20 min . ) first 4 week one individual session obesity clinic ( 10 20 min . ) every two week ( week 5 week 12 ) . Total session 12 week : 8 ( include final data collection visit ) .The component program : 1 ) Low carbohydrate ( aim achieve spontaneous reduction calorie intake ) 2 ) increase physical activity ; 3 ) behavioral strategy facilitate adherence diet activity prescription .
DOC.criteria: 20 year old old Arabic Male female Body mass index kg/m2 ( BMI ) â‰¥30 Had recent weight loss equal 5 % baseline weight Currently take weight loss medication enrol another weight loss program Undergone schedule ( within study duration ) weight loss surgery History diabetes , thyroid dysfunction endocrine abnormality , gout , coronary heart disease , stroke , malignancy psychological condition Medical condition limit ability comply program 's physical activity recommendation Pregnant lactate woman If one participant recruit study , family member live home ineligible ( avoid contamination ripple effect weight loss )
